HandNode: 6 -7 -4 -0.0678256 -0 -0.678256 0.731689 2.1 1
Model: USMC23_4024.ASM.ive.(-2,4,3).trans

# Collision filer definitions
#   drawer: 0x1
#   everything else: 0x7ffe
CollisionFilter: 0x1 0x7ffe

# big drawers
Node: USMC23_4019.ASM
DAE: USMC23_4019.ASM1.dae
# small drawers
Node: USMC23_4009.ASM
DAE: USMC23_4009.ASM1.dae

# drawer support?
Node: USMC23_4006.ASM
DAE: USMC23_4006.ASM1.dae


# Slider constraint
# Node A, Node B, xyz axis, low value, high value, use ref frame A (0 or 1)
Slider: USMC23_4006.ASM  USMC23_4009.ASM  1 0 0  0 2  1
Slider: USMC23_4006.ASM  USMC23_4019.ASM  1 0 0  0 2  1
